title: Pathfinder Starters Kit
description:
Here is a small collection of Pathfinders books.  These are what I feel are the basic starters kit for both players and GMs..



included:


Core Rulebook

GM Guide

Advanced players guide

Pazio published Map-Packs (I also included the torrent file to my Dungeon Tiles incase you want more and trust me, you'll want more)

Bestiary I and II ( there are 4, but for now 2 will do)

NPC Codex (for help with creating NPCs, and encounters with humanoids)
